physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Intraoral examination revealed a class II composite restoration present with respect to tooth 36. The tooth was tender on percussion. Teeth 35 and 36 exhibited grade II mobility. Pulp sensibility testing gave an exaggerated lingering response. Mobility of tooth 36 was reduced following endodontic therapy.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Mobility of tooth 36 was reduced following endodontic therapy; this indicates an improvement after treatment.
